header.heading: Scambi’s Labs are where the magic happens.
header.desc: Labs are ***paneurethic*** experiences where participants are stimulated to cooperate and interact in order to acknowledge and understand what appears as strangea and odd, but also to know better themselves, others and the world around them.

labs-def.heading: So, what’s a Lab?
labs-def.text: Labs are some sort of “work-groups”, guided by an expert host aimed at exploring from many different perspectives the current edition theme.
